note:
Dr. David Solot is an I/O psychologist, and a multiple award-winning innovator in the assessment and learning space. His products have won four Brandon Hall Awards, and most recently the Talent Experience prize in Pitchfest at HR Tech, ahead of over 100 other entrants.

He is the Chief Scientist and Head of Product for Sciolytix, where he oversees the development of the S2P2 assessment and the DigitalChalk LMS.
